One of the great composers. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ernst_toch Recordings
of his works are rare, though their number is increasing. I value this one highly.

For security, it is *highly* recommended that you verify this album with PGP
immediately after downloading it. If you don't know what PGP is or how to use
it, download GnuPG and learn. A brief run-through is included with the torrent.
In short, download the torrent, copy the PGP sig from freetexthost, import my
public key and verify the archive containing the album. (My public key will be
hosted at freetexthost dot com slash gvp1sg52ml for as long as that site
remains above water.) Only an authentic copy of this rip will return a good
signature--discard any torrent that fails.

*   *   *   *   *   *   *

PGP signature for this album: freetexthost dot com slash vmrcq1ppgm
